title: Ep 15: Lady, Your Nails Are Dry
itunes:title: Ep 15: Lady, Your Nails Are Dry
itunes:subtitle: We sat down with editorial manicurist Bernadette Thompson, the woman who single-handedly took nail art from the world of hip-hop to high fashion. Seriously, she's worked with everyone from Mary J. Blige to Tom Ford. Before that: Products millennia...
description:
We sat down with editorial manicurist Bernadette Thompson, the woman who single-handedly took nail art from the world of hip-hop to high fashion. Seriously, she's worked with everyone from Mary J. Blige to Tom Ford. Before that: Products millennials love; the "Tech Neck" phenomenon; and natural lash enhancers.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
